Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Warsaw and Bucharest, Naples and Warsaw, Naples and Bucharest, Naples and Lisbon, Santorini and Bucharest, Lisbon and Bucharest, Krakow and Warsaw, Santorini and Naples, Lisbon and Warsaw, Lisbon and Krakow.
